section.name: Import - Export
section.p: One should not copy repository files in a running system, since you can look at them as a common database changing at evry time. To make a backup it is saver to export.

You can do this using the export import context-menupoints in the tree or you use the import/export servlets. This servlets are the same as thouse used in the tree:
/.magnolia/mgnl-export and /.magnolia/mgnl-import
